colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSKOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA NGO MA LDOG PAR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL PA BYUNG RGYAL BA SONG BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS ZHES BGYIS PA'I NYES PA'I TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, 'ON KYANG GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,) DGE'O, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
